meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The tall buildings in the city create an urbanest atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: She loved the urbanest neighborhoods with bustling streets and vibrant culture.
meanings.sent3: Living in the urbanest part of town, he felt like a true city dweller.
meanings.sent4: Her style was urbanest, always reflecting the latest city trends.
meanings.sent5: The urbanest skyline at night was a sight to behold, filled with twinkling lights.

meanings.sent1: He considered himself the urbanest in the group, having lived in multiple cities.
meanings.sent2: The urbanest of all the areas, the downtown district was always bustling.
meanings.sent3: Being the urbanest meant he knew all the best city shortcuts and hidden gems.
meanings.sent4: In the concrete jungle, she was the urbanest, navigating the streets with ease.
meanings.sent5: The urbanest among them, he embraced the fast-paced city life with open arms.
